description: This file sets up and demonstrates the usage of an Upstash Vector database within a larger agent-based system, including initializing the database, creating a knowledge base from a PDF URL, loading the knowledge, and querying via an agent.

classes.name: UpstashVectorDb
classes.description: Class representing the connection to an Upstash Vector database.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, utilizing a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and handles responses.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Method to load the knowledge base, with options to recreate and upsert data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response from the agent based on a query.
